name: Matcha Green Tea Powder
description: High-quality Japanese green tea powder, perfect for making traditional matcha tea or for use in baking.

name: Soy Sauce
description: Traditional Japanese soy sauce, brewed for several months to bring out its rich, umami flavor.

name: Ramen Noodles
description: Authentic Japanese ramen noodles, made with wheat flour and kansui (alkaline) water for a chewy texture.

name: Wasabi
description: Spicy Japanese condiment, made from a blend of horseradish, mustard, and food coloring.

name: Tempura Batter Mix
description: Easy-to-use tempura batter mix, perfect for making crispy and light tempura at home.

name: Sushi Rice
description: Short-grain Japanese rice, specially formulated for making sushi with its sticky texture.

name: Miso Soup
description: Traditional Japanese soup made from fermented soybeans and dashi broth, perfect for a warm and comforting meal.

name: Panko Breadcrumbs
description: Japanese-style breadcrumbs, made from bread without crusts and resulting in a crispier texture.

name: Teriyaki Sauce
description: Sweet and savory Japanese sauce made from soy sauce, mirin, sake, and sugar, perfect for marinading meats and vegetables.

name: Nori Seaweed
description: Thin sheets of dried and roasted seaweed, commonly used in sushi rolls and other Japanese dishes.
